meta.title: POE2 League Starter Campaign Guide - Master Info Sheet
meta.purpose: Running reference database for cross-checking the one-page campaign guide. Based on user-provided Maxroll summaries + previously gathered external notes; items requiring verification are flagged.
notes: This file is intended to be re-uploaded/pasted into future chats to restore context.
Fields marked 'verification_flag' should be validated against primary sources (GGG patch notes / in-game) when available.
2025-12-12: Added campaign progression section common-level ranges table (v1) + build overlay data-format templates.

sources.name: Maxroll - Comprehensive League Start Leveling Guide
sources.author: ZiggyD

sources.name: Maxroll - Path of Exile 2 Campaign Walkthrough
sources.author: havoc616

sources.name: Mobalytics - Campaign layout guides (Act 1/2/4) + Permanent buffs pages
sources.author: Various (incl. Lolcohol)
sources.status: External notes only (not fully captured as text in this database)

campaign_structure.full_release_note: Per user-provided walkthrough summary: full release planned as 6 acts with no interludes.

leveling_breakpoints.details: Look for 'Runner’s' prefix; transmute boots aggressively; augment magic boots without a prefix.

leveling_breakpoints.upgrade: Ruby Ring / Attribute amulets / Flask charges
Flask upgrade (Colossal) / 20% MS boots / Spirit amulet

upgrade_rules.title: Resistance rings
upgrade_rules.detail: Craft/loot ruby/sapphire/topaz rings for upcoming bosses.

upgrade_rules.title: Refresh main weapon
upgrade_rules.detail: Replace or craft your weapon every ~8-10 levels.

upgrade_rules.title: Late campaign flasks
upgrade_rules.detail: Upgrade to Gargantuan/Ultimate flasks and roll charge regen.

reward_notes: Uncut Skill Gem Level 1 (Reaching Clearfell)
Permanent buff: +10% Cold Resistance (Head of the Winter Wolf)
Abandoned Stash: Uncut Skill Gem L1
Quest reward: Uncut Support Gem L1

zones.zone: The Grelwood / The Red Vale / Tree of Souls
reward_notes: Areagne: Uncut Support Gem L1; her Cauldron: Medium Life & Mana Flask
Rust King: Runed Girdles -> Runed Spikes (return to Renly)
Use Runed Spikes at Tree of Souls
Uncut Support Gem L1
Ancient Ruins: guaranteed Iron Ring or Lazuli Ring
Key pieces -> Memorial Gate -> Count Lachlann’s Ring
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Gembloom Skull: +30 Spirit + Uncut Spirit Gem (level per summary)
Charm choice (Sapphire recommended in provided summary)
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (Lost Lute)
Unlock Salvage Bench (first character) via Renley’s tools
Secret chest: Artificer’s Orb + Blank Rune
Uncut Support Gem L1 (secret)
Candlemass’ Essence: +20 Maximum Life
Fire resistance recommended; frees Risu
Barya for Trial of the Sekhemas (Ascendancy)
Ascendancy unlock (touch altar)
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Secret: guaranteed Magic Amulet
Resistance ring choice (Ruby recommended); Essence of Water; Uncut Support Gem

zones.zone: Valley of the Titans / Titan Grotto
reward_notes: Place Sun + Kabala relics at Relic Altar near waypoint; changeable permanent relic buff; Uncut Support Gem
Secret: Titan's Sword (guaranteed Lesser Rune)
Deliver Final Letter to Shambrin: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Sisters of Garukhan shrine: +10% Lightning Resistance
End of Act 2
Lesser Jeweller’s Orb (high priority)
Hanging Tree secret: Magic Ring
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Permanent buff choice (cannot be changed): examples include stun threshold / ailment threshold / mana regen
Gemrot Skull: +30 Spirit + Uncut Spirit Gem (level per summary)
Optional: Flameskin Ritual temp fire res
Inscribed Ultimatum for Trial of Chaos (Ascendancy)
Soul core puzzle; Flame Core: +10% Fire Resistance
Large Soul Core
Reforging Bench unlock (first character); time pressure mechanic
Shade mechanic to avoid stacking burn
Use Sacrificial Heart: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
End of Act 3 -> unlock Act 4
Rog: disenchanting; Tujen: gamble; Ange: async trading/hideout/currency exchange (per walkthrough)
Strategy note: doing Whakapanu early can unlock hideout/currency exchange/async trading (per summary)
Goddess of Justice: +30% Life OR Mana Flask Recovery (changeable)
Silent Hall: +5% Maximum Mana permanent buff
Blank Tattoos: permanent +5 Attribute or +5% Resist choices
Book reward attribution flagged (see verification flags)
Delirium distilled emotions for instilling amulet (per summary)
Blind Beast: Blank Greater Rune (per provided summary). Weapon-set points from Blind Beast are flagged for verification due to known 0.4 changes in other notes.
Activate six Megaliths
Consume Warden's Ledger: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Optional quest: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (from Risu in summary)
Skullmaw Stairway: Molten One’s Gift -> +5% Maximum Life
Optional: Yoon's Barya / Rangeen's Barya -> choice of Rare Ring/Amulet/Jewel
Changeable permanent buff (examples listed: 12% CDR, 3% MS, 5% XP)
Sacred Wells reward (Exalt + Alch) is flagged for verification
Uncut Skill Gem Level 14
Gemcrust Skull: +40 Spirit + Uncut Spirit Gem Level 14
Icy Tusks: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (from Hilda in summary)
One free Unique item (per summary)
Quest: 'Siege of Oriath' -> Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (per summary)

crafting_and_currency: Runes are the strongest campaign crafting tool (weapon damage runes; armor resistance runes).
Salvage all socketed and quality gear you aren’t using.
Early: prioritize gold to buy key bases/flasks/jewelry; later mix in disenchanting for shards.
Use Transmutes freely; Augments sparingly; Regals on strong 2-mod magic items; Alchs sparingly on an up-to-date weapon or long-term utility item.
survival: Keep moving; run circles around enemies; 'hug the boss' for easier dodging.
Resist cap matters greatly; target specific resistances for known upcoming bosses.

attributes: Respec flexible attribute nodes (small gold cost)
Grab bonus attribute nodes if needed
mana: Use charge regen suffix for bosses
Mana on kill for clearing; leech is supplemental early

qol_and_tech: CTRL+Click shortcut to NPC interactions (e.g., identify all).
Checkpoints: teleport to discovered checkpoints; respawn-at-checkpoint can reset zones.
Movement skills via temporary mace/shield + uncut gem (Leap Slam / Shield Charge); weapon swap passives can temporarily allocate STR nodes; dodge-roll to animation-cancel landing.

verification_flags.item: Act 4 - Blind Beast reward includes +2 weapon-set points
verification_flags.reason: User-provided walkthrough summary claims points + Blank Greater Rune; other external notes indicate 0.4 moved the tome to Dark Mists/Omniphobia. Verify against patch notes/in-game.

verification_flags.item: Act 4 - Halls of the Dead: Navali grants +2 weapon-set points
verification_flags.reason: User-provided summary attributes points to Navali; external notes suggest reward tied to Trial completion; verify.

verification_flags.item: Interlude 2 - Sacred Wells guarantee Exalted Orb + Orb of Alchemy
verification_flags.reason: Often reported inconsistently; treat as unconfirmed until validated.

verification_flags.item: Interlude 2 - Orbala's Pillar exact boon options
verification_flags.reason: User-provided list may be incomplete/variable; verify.

verification_flags.description: Act 4 section levels include Kingsmarch at 53-54 while nearby Act 4 zones are 46-48; verify Act 4 order/area levels vs in-game.

campaign_progression_sections.description: Ordered campaign guide sections (as used in the website guide) with common player level ranges for each section. Intended to be build-agnostic; build overlays can insert milestones/checklists into these sections.

sections.route_summary: Stay on the shoreline; push to Bloated Miller; exit to Clearfell.
route_steps: Follow the coast in a single direction to minimize backtracking.
Kill Bloated Miller when you hit the arena.
Continue forward to the Clearfell exit.

sections.route_summary: Push through to Beira; don't full-clear; keep moving toward the exit.
route_steps: Follow the main path; avoid deep side loops.
Kill Beira when you hit her arena; grab the permanent reward if present.
Head straight to the next exit after the fight.

sections.route_summary: Wall-follow; locate the objective; leave immediately.
route_steps: Pick a wall and follow it consistently.
Do the required objective/boss if present.
Back to the main path and out.

sections.section_title: The Grelwood / The Red Vale / Tree of Souls
sections.route_summary: Use the Act 1 wall-follow patterns; treat these as straight shot zones.
route_steps: Commit to one edge (left/right) until you find the next transition.
Only detour for mandatory gates/permanent power.
Use checkpoints to reset position if you overshoot.

sections.route_summary: Find the Weaver's Chambers by committing to an edge; don't spiral.
route_steps: Follow a single outer edge until you hit a major branch.
If you find dead-ends repeatedly, swap to the opposite edge.
Exit once the required objective is done.

sections.route_summary: Sweep the perimeter; enter Mausoleum/Tomb from Cemetery and return; then leave.
route_steps: Hug the outer edge to find subzone entrances.
Enter Mausoleum/Tomb as you find them, finish them, and return to Cemetery.
After both are done, continue perimeter to the exit.

sections.route_summary: Straightforward crypt; stay on the main hallway to the boss and exit.
route_steps: Follow the central corridor, ignoring deep side rooms.
Clear the required encounter/boss when found.
Exit quickly after the objective.

sections.route_summary: Run one edge to find Freythorn; kill King in the Mists; leave.
route_steps: Pick an edge and run it until the Freythorn entrance appears.
Do the required boss/objective in Freythorn.
Return and continue to next zone.

sections.route_summary: Follow the U-shape logic to find quest objective and exit.
route_steps: Move in a broad U-shape rather than criss-crossing.
Complete the required quest objective (Lost Lute).
Continue the U path until the exit appears.

sections.route_summary: Keep moving; hit the Executioner; proceed to Manor Ramparts.
route_steps: Follow the main roads through the village.
Kill the Executioner when encountered; grab required unlock if any.
Continue to Manor Ramparts.

sections.route_summary: Follow the U-shape; identify which seed you have; go to Ogham Manor.
route_steps: Run the U-shape pattern; if you hit a quick dead-end, you likely have the flipped seed.
Use the seed tell to choose NE vs NW exit direction.
Proceed into Ogham Manor.

sections.route_summary: Floor-to-floor: always go opposite your entry direction; cross bridges; boss on floor 3.
route_steps: Floor 1: head toward the bridge side; clear the required boss if it grants permanent power; then go to Floor 2.
Floor 2: go opposite the entrance direction; cross bridge; find Floor 3.
Floor 3: go opposite entrance direction; find bridge -> Count -> elevator to boss.

sections.route_summary: Long road segment; follow the main path toward Traitor’s Passage.
route_steps: Stick to the central road and avoid deep side caves.
Tag the waypoint when you see it.
Keep pushing forward to the next zone transition.

sections.route_summary: Follow the rails downward; dive into the mine and finish Rudja; exit to the trial.
route_steps: Stay on the cart rails to descend through the quarry.
Take downward splits toward mine shafts until you hit Rudja.
After the fight, continue to the Trial of the Sekhemas exit.

sections.route_summary: Find the Decree (lore book). Yellow seals lead to Balbala; otherwise keep pushing to Halani.
route_steps: Move generally opposite your entry direction as a baseline.
At the Decree/lore book intersection: follow yellow paper seals for Balbala.
After Balbala, resume direction toward Halani Gates.

sections.route_summary: Linear bridges funnel you; just keep pushing to boss/exit (bring lightning res if possible).
route_steps: Go opposite entry direction and follow bridges.
Don't overthink branches; it's a funnel.
Prepare for lightning damage on boss if relevant.

sections.route_summary: Circular trial arena; keep moving to reach Rattlecage and finish the gauntlet.
route_steps: Run the outer ring to find arena triggers.
Stay mobile through the trial waves.
Defeat Rattlecage and leave via the unlocked exit.

sections.route_summary: Run outer edge to find Kabala/Venom Pit; use checkpoint warp to search opposite edge fast.
route_steps: Run one outside edge watching for Venom Pit/Kabala.
Tag the exit checkpoint then warp back to the start checkpoint.
Run the opposite outside edge; then check remaining corners if needed.

sections.section_title: Mastodon Badlands / The Lost City / V
sections.route_summary: Badlands: wall-follow. Lost City: find the V-bridge, then far wall to exit. V/Titans: perimeter seals then Titan Grotto.
route_steps: Badlands: hug a wall until the exit.
Lost City: find the V-bridge by checking corners; cross; run far wall to the wing-shaped exit tile.
Valley/Titans: locate sealed Titan Grotto, then perimeter-run for 3 seals; return to grotto.

sections.section_title: The Bone Pits / Buried Shrines / The Titan Grotto
sections.route_summary: Gather Titan seals in shrines, then open the grotto and fight Zalmarath.
route_steps: Run through Bone Pits into the shrine area.
Circle shrines to collect seals while staying on the perimeter.
Use the seals to open Titan Grotto and defeat the boss.

sections.section_title: Deshar / Path of Mourning / Spires of Deshar
sections.route_summary: Climb through Deshar collecting key pieces; unlock the gate; circle the spires for seals and boss.
route_steps: Follow the main ascent while grabbing key items.
Use the Memorial Gate to enter the Spires/Titan area.
Run the spire perimeter for seals, then climb to Tor Gul.

sections.route_summary: Board the Dreadnought and push forward through vanguard packs to Jamanra.
route_steps: Move toward the prow using the main deck paths.
Clear vanguard groups as you advance upward.
Finish with the Jamanra encounter and exit.

sections.route_summary: Marsh: ride the outer edge to the Jungle entrance. Jungle: loop perimeter to the arena and leave.
route_steps: Hug one side of the marsh until the Jungle Ruins transition.
Grab quick rewards only if on-path; avoid backtracking.
In Jungle Ruins, follow the outer loop to Mighty Silverfist then exit.

sections.route_summary: Linear descent into the barrens; stay on the main spine to the objective/boss.
route_steps: Push straight through Venom Crypts toward the drop-down.
In Infested Barrens, follow the central spine to the boss.
Take permanent power when found and leave immediately.

sections.route_summary: Bog: follow waterways to Ignagduk. Wetlands: push to the Chimera/trial path.
route_steps: Hug a bank through Azak Bog to reach the boss arena.
Avoid poison pools; reset via checkpoint if lost.
Enter Chimeral Wetlands and follow the main route to Xyclucian/trial.

sections.section_title: Jiquani’s Machinarium / The Temple of Chaos
sections.route_summary: Machinarium: loop corridors for the soul core/optional boss. Temple: straight push to the trial.
route_steps: Circle the outer loop to reach machinery and Blackjaw (optional).
Secure the soul core, then continue to the Temple of Chaos.
Follow the direct path to the Trial/Ascendancy portal.

sections.route_summary: Open side labs to unlock the central chamber; head to Zicoatl.
route_steps: Clear side wings to power the central doors.
Use bridges/elevators to reach the upper level.
Fight Zicoatl once the core room opens.

sections.section_title: The Matlan Waterways / The Drowned City
sections.route_summary: Stay on the main canals, crossing bridges toward the flooded plaza exit.
route_steps: Follow canal edges, swapping sides via bridges when needed.
Enter the Drowned City when you reach the submerged hub.
Keep to the primary route until the final exit.

sections.section_title: The Molten Vault / Apex of Filth / Temple of Kopec
sections.route_summary: Vault rails to Forgemaster; Apex climb with shade windows; Kopec outer path to Ketzuli.
route_steps: Follow rail lines in the Molten Vault to Mektul/bench unlock.
In Apex of Filth, climb ramps during shade downtime to reach the top.
Temple of Kopec: circle the outer path into the boss arena.

sections.route_summary: Short connector; go straight to the exit/portal.
route_steps: Head forward along the main corridor.
Ignore side rooms; leave as soon as the exit appears.

sections.route_summary: Past zone; take the main road to the Sacrificial Heart objective and exit.
route_steps: Enter the past portal and follow the primary road.
Use the Sacrificial Heart at the marked altar.
Leave once the objective is complete.

sections.route_summary: Linear past zone; rush to Doryani and exit.
route_steps: Take the past portal and head straight forward.
Ignore optional side wings to save time.
Defeat Doryani and leave.

sections.route_summary: Hub zone; tag waypoint and choose your next targets.
route_steps: Grab waypoint/vendors on arrival.
Plan which surrounding zones to tackle next.
Return here between objectives.

sections.route_summary: Boat to island; follow coast to the cavern; descend to the Deep Mother.
route_steps: Take the boat and hug the coastline to the cavern entrance.
Move downward through the cavern to the arena.
Kill the Deep Mother and leave.

sections.route_summary: Linear prison crawl; reach the Goddess reward and exit.
route_steps: Follow cell blocks toward the central yard.
Interact with the Goddess of Justice reward.
Exit via the far gate.

sections.route_summary: Climb to the Silent Hall; complete tests and take the reward.
route_steps: Use bridges to move upward through the arena wings.
Finish the Tests of Mettle and reach the Silent Hall.
Take the permanent buff and leave.

sections.route_summary: Advance through trial arenas to Yama; keep moving around totems.
route_steps: Follow the main path through each arena segment.
Complete the Trial and face Yama.
Collect rewards and exit.

sections.route_summary: Shoreline route to Hartlin; brace for Omniphobia reveal; exit to Kingsmarch.
route_steps: Move along the docks/shoreline toward the ship encounter.
Defeat Captain Hartlin and handle the reveal event.
Use the exit to return to Kingsmarch.

sections.route_summary: Circle the island to the Warrens; do optional Blind Beast, then Krutog.
route_steps: Run the island perimeter to find the Warrens entrance.
Take the optional Blind Beast if you detour.
Push to Krutog and exit.

sections.route_summary: Follow main path; only detour for permanent power/required gates.
route_steps: Commit to a direction; avoid full-clears.
Do permanent power as soon as encountered.
Exit immediately after required objective.

fields.section_title: string; display title for the guide section

fields.name: string; display name
fields.section_inserts: array of {campaign_section_id, milestone_group_ids[], checklist_item_ids[], notes, placement_hint}
fields.rules: optional; rules for auto-mapping milestone groups to sections based on level-range overlap

build_overlays.name: Poisonburst Pathfinder (Fubgun) — Leveling

static_panels.how_to_play: REUSE EXISTING WEBSITE OVERLAY CONTENT (already implemented).
static_panels.key_tips: REUSE EXISTING WEBSITE OVERLAY CONTENT (already implemented).

auto_map_milestone_groups.note: When rendering a campaign section, include any milestone group whose level_range overlaps the section common_level_range.

build_overlays.verification_flag: Milestone group boundaries were derived from the Mobalytics guide variants; validate if guide updates.
